mapper.select: SELECT u_id, U.c_num, c_name, c_discount, uc_state, TO_CHAR(c_startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') c_startdate, TO_CHAR(c_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd') c_enddate, TO_CHAR(uc_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') uc_date FROM user_coupon U INNER JOIN admin_coupon A ON U.c_num = A.c_num WHERE u_id = #{u_id} ORDER BY c_num DESC

select to_char(seat_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') as seat_date, ti_num, ti_status, u_id, to_char(ti_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') as ti_regdate, to_char(ti_update,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') as ti_update from ticket where u_id = #{u_id} order by ti_num desc
